text: (garaz vah gaya aur yoosuph se kahane laga) ai yoosuph ai bade sachche (yoosuph) zara hamen ye to bataie ki saat motee taazee gaayon ko saat patalee gaay khae jaatee hai aur saat baaliyo hain haree kachava aur phir (saat) sookhee murajhaee (isakee taabeer kya hai) to main logon ke paas palat kar jaoon (aur bayaan karun)
